text:
Imam Kazim(s): Whenever you are scared of something, recite one hundred verses of the #Quran from wherever you #wish and then say three #times: 

Allāhumma-k-shif ‘annī-al balā

(O my Lord(#Allah), Get the calamity #away from me.)

#coronavirus
#Covid19 
#Netflix
